TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Polo't, title = Polo't, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo't} }

S.FORM: == Pangangan 大峰峰名稱由來 == Polo't a niyaro', Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Polo't a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 77 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 70 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis44%, Kebalan42%, roma5%. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群

== Pangangan 大峰峰名稱由來 == Polo't a niyaro', Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Polo't a niyaro', 33 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 77 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 70 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 7 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis44%, Kebalan42%, roma5%. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群
